content.value:
Located just 10 meters from the Gabriel García Márquez cultural center, Luis Ángel Arango library, the mint, and 50 meters from the Plaza de Bolívar, the museum on July 20 and the most important tourist sites in the historic center.

We offer 4 Private rooms with double bed, television, WiFi and shared bathroom, a shared room with four bunk beds for eight people and a shared room with three bunk beds for six people.

In a prime location in the Candelaria - Centro Historico district of Bogotá, Hostel Casa Iscol is set 400 m from Luis Angel Arango Library, less than 1 km from Bolivar Square and a 13-minute walk from Quevedo's Jet. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a shared kitchen, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation offers a shared lounge, and organising tours for guests.

description.description: Hostal Casa Iscol is an architectural heritage property in the city of Bogotá. The strategic location, facilities and services make an unparalleled option when contracting lodging and complementary services. You will find comfortable, safe, friendly accommodation.
